name: Dinari AVGO
description: The Dinari dShare token for Broadcom Inc. Common Stock (AVGO.d) represents a 1:1 backed token tied to shares of Broadcom Inc. Each AVGO.d token is fully collateralized by an equivalent Broadcom share held securely in a transparent treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, this tokenized equity offers investors enhanced accessibility, including 24/7 trading, instant settlements, fractional ownership, and improved transferability. Dinari's goal is to bridge the gap between traditional finance and blockchain, making investing in top companies like Broadcom more efficient and inclusive.
